body: Hi Chris, Thank you for your input. By changeing the tolerance in the component HB now identifies all interior walls, the problem is that when I run an energy simulation E+ (daylight seems to be working fine) doesnt seem to find the adjacent surfaces? (gh file attached)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dm99ly9wi65WaJ9xYVjoaxNuaROwbwI7JeyaErRII7ZlK2Me-ybyi9vpe1qEBxqo4C0HlHrJzHPhK5-mrYAQB4NEZTBRBMin/SurfaceNotFound.JPG) Not sure if the problem is still in the adjacencies component. Thank you, Blanca
